DOC.criteria: Male female patient symptomatic PAH ( Idiopathic , Familial , Associated PAH due connective tissue disease , congenital heart disease , portal hypertension liver cirrhosis , due anorexigen amphetamine use ) Treatment naive patient patient pretreated Endothelin Antagonist Prostacyclinanalogue ( except I.V. ) .
